msbt.message: So tonight's Countdown, huh?I used to enjoy the fireworks more, but these days they kinda jangle my tired old nerves, .
Already the end of another year. Almost time for Countdown again!I know it's the last event of the year and all that, but I dunno if I'm gonna be able to stay awake till then
One big blast to close out the year That's our Countdown, .A while ago, I saw 'em settin' up special stalls in the island plaza. You ready to do some celebratin'?
Countdown's the only event that spills over into another yearI mean, it's this year's last event and the first event of the next. Makes it seem too big to miss.
